article.title: Insitu Awarded ScanEagle Support Funds
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Insitu Incorporated, Bingen, Washington, is being awarded a $35,507,379 modification to a previously awarded firm-fixed-price contract for additional operational and maintenance services in support of the ScanEagle unmanned aerial system. These services will provide electro-optical/infrared and mid-wave infrared imagery in support of land-based operations in Operation Enduring Freedom to provide real-time imagery and data. The Naval Air Systems Command, Patuxent River, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
